voice.name: bits3-hsmm
voice.description: A male German Hidden semi-Markov model voice, built from voice recordings provided by the BITS project at the Bavarian Archive of Speech Signals.
voice.files: conf/de-bits3-hsmm.config, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/str.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/tree-str.inf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/tree-lf0.inf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/gv-str-littend.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/tree-mgc.inf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/gv-mgc-littend.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/lf0.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/dur.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/gv-lf0-littend.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/mix_excitation_filters.txt, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/US10031140_0.pfeats, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/trickyPhones.txt, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/mgc.pdf, lib/voices/bits3-hsmm/tree-dur.inf
